About me

Hi, I’m Jack. I’m currently a graduate student studying bioinformatics. One of areas I’m particularly focused on is (biological) data processing, visualization, and accessibility. Additionally, I do a lot of integrative analysis using different types of biological data.

In my free time, I’m on involved in the Rust programming language. There, I’m heavily involved in Chalk and co-lead the traits working group.
